articles.title: Logitech G435 Lightspeed Gaming Wireless Headset With Up to 18-Hour Playback Launched in India - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Logitech G435 Lightspeed wireless gaming headphones with 40mm drivers and up to 18 hours of playtime have been launched in India. The headphones are priced at Rs. 7,495, and are available in Black and Neon Yellow, Blue and Raspberry, and Off-White and Lilac c…
articles.content: Logitech G435 Lightspeed wireless gaming headset was launched in India on Monday. Logitech G, a brand of Logitech, says that the headset offers comfort, affordability, sustainability, fun colour opti… [+1998 chars]
